description: Frequency sweep configuration for guane15 (Xeon E5645 - Westmere, pcc-cpufreq driver)
notes: Adapted for guane15.uis.edu.co: Xeon E5645 (Westmere, 2010) with 8x Tesla M2075 (Fermi GF110). CPU: pcc-cpufreq driver, 1.6-2.4 GHz. GPU: Base 575 MHz, typical range 405-700 MHz. 5 CPU × 5 GPU × 4 benchmarks × 5 sizes × 5 reps = 2500 experiments. IMPORTANT: Verify actual GPU frequency support with 'nvidia-smi -q -d SUPPORTED_CLOCKS' before running. Old Tesla cards may have limited frequency steps.
